abstract: Pak Nam-Chol (Chosŏn'gŭl: 박남철; hancha: 朴南哲; born October 3, 1988) is a North Korean international football player.Pak has appeared for the Korea DPR national football team in 4 FIFA World Cup qualifying matches.
comment: Pak Nam-Chol (Chosŏn'gŭl: 박남철; hancha: 朴南哲; born October 3, 1988) is a North Korean international football player.Pak has appeared for the Korea DPR national football team in 4 FIFA World Cup qualifying matches.
